post.description: Used to void an "Authorizations" resource without a resource id.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Client Profile ID to query on

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This is the offset into the results to begin returning from

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: This is the maximum number of reults to return in a single response message.

parameters.name: asofdttm
parameters.description: Query for results as of a particular time stamp.

asofdttm.description: results as of date and time (yymmddhhmmss)

setlpossign.description: settlement position sign, C or D

400.description: Used when validation fails or transaction is rejected.

tCode.description: Code that can be used to contact Visa about a specific error.

ShrtNm.description: Contains the name of the card acceptor (merchant)

PmtAccRef.description: Positions 1 4 contain the BIN controller identifier, a four-character registered value assigned by EMVCo. Positions 5 29 contain a 25-alphanumeric character uppercase unique value linked to a PAN.

PrtlApprvlSpprtd.description: Indicates whether the terminal can support partially approved amounts. Set to true if partial authorization is supported and false if partial authorization is not supported

SvcTp.description: Service Type. FLSV(Full service), SLSV(Self service)

correlatnId.description: correlatnId field must contain the same value as the original transaction being voided.

GoodsAndSvcsTp.description: Specifies the type of goods and/or services sold. Possible values are: ELEC (Electronic goods and services), PHYS (Physical goods or services)

ChngInd.description: Contains a code that indicates why a ticket was changed.

RstrctdTcktInd.description: This subfield is used to indicate the purchase of a nonrefundable ticket. It is a conditional subfield for passenger transport transactions.

Nm.description: This 20-character subfield contains the passenger's name and is left-justified. Right space-fill is required.

Rsn.description: Value for CSCV Value not entered

LineItm.description: A separate line item should be added to the array for each fuel, non-fuel, and expanded non-fuel product included in the transaction. The array can accept up to 1 fuel type, 8 non-fuel types, and 4 expanded non-fuel types, for a maximum of 13 line items within the array.

LclAccptrId.description: Contains Spanish merchant ID when it differs from the international merchant ID.

Tp.description: Mastercard, Amex, Discover/Diners Gateway data. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

Val.description: Mastercard, Amex, Discover/Diners Gateway data values. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

GatewayAddtnlDataResp.description: Addtnldata for GatewayData. Contains Tp, Val pairs of data for non-Visa branded cards. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

PANFourLastDgts.description: Last 4 digits of the account number.

Frqcy.description: Frequency of Recurring Payment. DAIL(daily), TWWK(twice weekly), WEEK(weekly), TEND(ten days), FRTN(fortnightly), MNTH(monthly), BIMN(every two months), TMTR(trimester), QURT(quarterly), MIAN(twice yearly), YEAR(annually),ADHO(unscheduled)

Id.description: Request from Merchant for Updated Account
Location where the credentials are stored on file. Possible values include: VCIND - Indicates that the transaction was processed through Visa Checkout.

XpctdClrDt.description: Expected clearing date of the transaction. Date is in Julian date format, yddd

Nm.description: Contains a special program detail response value. For ACI, response values can be found in field 62.1 of the Full Service POS Online Messages Technical Specifications document. For ValCode, response values can be found in field 62.3 of the Full Service POS Online Messages Technical Specifications document. For BusTranTp, valid value is 1 - Token program. For USREG, valid values are REGU  regulated account, and NREG  nonregulated. For MVV, the value sent in the request will be returned in the response. For SPEND, the value sent in the request will be returned in the response. For DwngdRsnCd, response values can be found in field 62.3 of the Full Service POS Online Messages Technical Specifications document

Val.description: Contains a value Val for each Tp included in the array. Valid values: REGU  regulated account, NREG  non-regulated account. Valid values for RmbrsmntAttr: 0 - Chip Standard purchase and credit voucher transactionsCanada. Code U also applies to these transactions, 3 - EPS (Australia and New Zealand) and NSR(Canada), 4 - Supermarket Incentive Program (U.S. only), 5 - Electronic Commerce Fee, 7 - Electronic Data Capture(VE only). Not for Asia-Pacific region for original draft transactions.CNP and CVV2 fee programs(VE), 8 - PIN-authenticated Visa Debit, 9 - VPAY Large-Market Petrol (VE Only), B - Applies to:Interregional Electronic, CEMEA Intraregional Electronic, Asia-Pacific Electronic Reimbursement Fee, Canada Chip Fee(only in response), U.K. Card Not Present, U.K. Electronic Hot Card File, International Visa Electron Card, U.K. Airline Interim Interchange Reimbursement Fee VE, Electronic Online Authorized (EOA), Europe EMV Fee, C - Reserved, D - Reserved: Delta-only merchant standard Interchange Reimbursement Fee(U.K. only). CPS/Charity and Religious Organizations and CPS/Retail 2 Fee Programs with MCCs of 8398 (Charitable and Social Service Organizations) and 8661 (Religious Organizations) for specific merchants meeting program requirements(U.S. only), E - Reserved, F - Delta-only merchant Electronic Interchange Reimbursement Fee (U.K. only). Recurring Payment and Emerging Segment Recurring Payment Interchange Reimbursement Fee(Canada only), J - Electronic Interchange Reimbursement Fee (U.S. only). Chip Electronic purchase and credit voucher transactions (Canada only), K - Key-entered Payment Service Reimbursement Fee(U.S. only for select developing markets only), L - Reserved for future use: BASE II Draft data transactions only, M - Card not present Interchange Reimbursement Fee(Canada only), N-S - Reserved for future use: BASE II Draft data transactions only, T - Reserved, U - Emerging Segment Standard(Canada). Chip Standard purchase and credit voucher transactions(Canada). Code 0 also applies to these  transactions. In addition, code 0 applies to Chip Standard transactions that request VPP fee programs. Chip Standard transactions that meet Emerging Segment Standard eligibility requirements and fee edit criteria must be submitted with code U., V - Reserved. Valid values for EVV: Any combination of Alphanumeric. No special characters. i.e '00000', '12345', 'ABC12'.

Nm.description: Contains a special program detail request value. For RmbrsmntAttr, please view the VPP February 2023 release notes for all valid values. For ACI, valid values are Y  requests participation, R  recuring payment, I  increment to previously approved transaction, and P  preferred customer. For ReqPmtSvc, valid values can be found in field 62.15 of the Full Service POS Online Messages Technical Specifications document. For MVV, clients should send in a 10 digit MVV. Should the MVV be 6 digits, clients should zero-fill the remaining 4 spaces. For SPEND, valid values are B  base spend assessment has been met, N  spend assessment has not been met, and Q  qualified spend assessment has been met.

Val.description: Contains a value Val for each Tp included in the array. Valid values: REGU  regulated account, NREG  non-regulated account. Valid values for RmbrsmntAttr: 0 - Chip Standard purchase and credit voucher transactionsCanada. Code U also applies to these transactions, 3 - EPS (Australia and New Zealand) and NSR(Canada), 4 - Supermarket Incentive Program (U.S. only), 5 - Electronic Commerce Fee, 7 - Electronic Data Capture(VE only). Not for Asia-Pacific region for original draft transactions.CNP and CVV2 fee programs(VE), 8 - PIN-authenticated Visa Debit, 9 - VPAY Large-Market Petrol (VE Only), B - Applies to:Interregional Electronic, CEMEA Intraregional Electronic, Asia-Pacific Electronic Reimbursement Fee, Canada Chip Fee(only in response), U.K. Card Not Present, U.K. Electronic Hot Card File, International Visa Electron Card, U.K. Airline Interim Interchange Reimbursement Fee VE, Electronic Online Authorized (EOA), Europe EMV Fee, C - Reserved, D - Reserved: Delta-only merchant standard Interchange Reimbursement Fee(U.K. only). CPS/Charity and Religious Organizations and CPS/Retail 2 Fee Programs with MCCs of 8398 (Charitable and Social Service Organizations) and 8661 (Religious Organizations) for specific merchants meeting program requirements(U.S. only), E - Reserved, F - Delta-only merchant Electronic Interchange Reimbursement Fee (U.K. only). Recurring Payment and Emerging Segment Recurring Payment Interchange Reimbursement Fee(Canada only), J - Electronic Interchange Reimbursement Fee (U.S. only). Chip Electronic purchase and credit voucher transactions (Canada only), K - Key-entered Payment Service Reimbursement Fee(U.S. only for select developing markets only), L - Reserved for future use: BASE II Draft data transactions only, M - Card not present Interchange Reimbursement Fee(Canada only), N-S - Reserved for future use: BASE II Draft data transactions only, T - Reserved, U - Emerging Segment Standard(Canada). Chip Standard purchase and credit voucher transactions(Canada). Code 0 also applies to these  transactions. In addition, code 0 applies to Chip Standard transactions that request VPP fee programs. Chip Standard transactions that meet Emerging Segment Standard eligibility requirements and fee edit criteria must be submitted with code U., V - Reserved. Valid values for EVV: Any combination of Alphanumeric. No special characters. i.e '00000', '12345', 'ABC12'.

Tp.description: Purchase Restriction Flag. Allows merchants to indicate POS terminal can support card restrictions

Val.description: Contains card restriction value. Valid values: 0  false, 1  true

Id.description: Request from Merchant for Updated Account.

clientId.description: Client Identification is a unique value assigned by Visa

CountryCd.description: Contains a country code for jurisdictions participating in domestic processing.

CtrySubDvsnMnr.description: The 3-character, card acceptor county code. For a U.S. card acceptor, it contains a 3-digit numeric county code as defined in FIPS PUB 6.3, 1979 (Federal Information Processing Standards Publication-Counties and County Equivalents of the States of the United States). This subfield does not apply to Canadian transactions.

AttnddInd.description: Used to indicate if the card acceptors representative is in attendance during the transaction. Semi-attended terminals (e.g., multiple terminals supervised by a single clerk) is considered attended.

FuelInd.description: Fuel indicator. This indicator should be included in each line item and describe if the product code for the line item is fuel (FuelInd = true), non-fuel (FuelInd = false), or expanded non-fuel (FuelInd = false)

TxRegnId.description: Merchant VAT Registration/ Single Business Reference Number

Tp.description: Fuel Transaction Validation Results

Val.description: Value for Fuel Transaction Validation Results

Dt.description: This value is the date of departure in mmddyy format.

Lctn.description: 3 character IATA airport code for the original departure location.

PAN.description: Account number or token used in the transaction.

Tp.description: Type of Additional Result. Possible Values: Dupl, AcctStatus, VAURsnCd

Val.description: Additional transaction result information If Tp=Dupl, no value is required. If Tp=AcctStatus, Possible Values are Closed(C), Contact Cardholder(Q), Expiration Date Change(E), Account Number Change(A). If Tp=VauRsnCd, possible values are VAU001 (Transaction did not qualify for Real Time VAU because the transaction contains token),VAU002 (Real Time VAU is supported only for Visa-branded PAN),VAU003 (Real Time VAU is not supported for the network),VAU004 (Transaction is not original purchase, purchase return, bill payment, account funding, or original credit),VAU005 (Transaction contains CVV2),VAU007 (Real Time VAU is not supported for this MCC),VAU008 (Acquirer of processor is not activated for Real Time VAU),VAU009 (Issuer does not support Real Time VAU),VAU010 (Issuer or Visa blocked the merchant),VAU012 (Credentials in the authorization request is the latest VAU data),VAU013 (Expiry date in the authorization request is later than VAU data),VAU014 (PAN has been opted out of VAU),VAU015 (Transaction is a face-to-face transaction type),VAU016 (PAN has stop advice set up)

TaxXmptn.description: Miscellaneous Fuel Tax Exemption Status. true(Exempt), false(Non-exempt)

Tp.description: Tp value for verification. Possible value is authenticationValue (3DS (3D Secure)) authentication performed during a secure electronic commerce transaction)

PstlCd.description: card acceptor postal or ZIP code. When present in a U.S. transaction, it contains the 5-digit or 9-digit ZIP Code (5-digit ZIP code plus 4-digit extension) for the location of the customer transaction. When present in a Canadian transaction, this subfield contains the 6- or 9-character alphanumeric postal code (the 9-character alphanumeric Canadian postal code is the 6-character alphanumeric postal code followed by three zeros). When it is present in a Brazilian transaction, this subfield contains the 8-character numeric postal code

TrlrNb.description: Fleet Trailer Number. Contains the trailer number for the Visa Fleet cardholder or vehicle-assigned card.

tRslt.description: Verification result. SUCC - Success, NOVF - Unable to verify, FAIL - Failure, ERRR - Error in verifying, MISS - Missing required value

CstmrSvc.description: Card-present transactions: contains the location of the merchant outlet where the transaction took place. Card-not-present transactions: contains the merchants customer service telephone number, the merchants universal resource locator (URL) or internet/e-mail address.

TSPId.description: Token Requestor - Token Service Provider ID

MsgClss.description: contains the 4-digit message type identifier from the original message.

Termnltp.description: This field contains a code that identifies a terminal at the card acceptor location, by itself or in conjunction with Card Acceptor Identification Code, when the value is not unique to a terminal.  An identification code of fewer than 8 positions must be left-justified and the remainder of the field space-filled

POSCondCd.description: contains a code identifying transaction conditions at the point-of-sale or point of service. For messages that follow an original request, this code identifies the type of processing being done.

RtrvlRefNb.description: This field contains a number that is used with other data elements as a key to identify and track all messages related to a given cardholder transaction; that is, to a given transaction set.

SysTracAudtNb.description: This field contains a number assigned by the message initiator that uniquely identifies a cardholder transaction and all message types

GatewaySplmntryData.description: SplmntryData for GatewayData. Contains supplementary data fields

Tp.description: Contains transaction additional amount type. Possible values are AMTQ - Requested amount (Transaction amount that has been requested to be authorized)

TxAttr.description: Contains Transaction Attribute Type.Possible values: INST (Installment payment), RCPT (Recurring payment), DBRP (Debt repayment), UCOF (Unscheduled Credentials on File), MOTO (Mail Order/Telephone Order), DFRD (Deferred), PAUT(Pre-Authorisation).

NbOfPmt.description: Number of Recurring Payment. 01-99  Helps the issuer to identify total number of recurring debits for that cardholder as agreed with merchant. Value of 99 means that recurring payments are authorized until canceled or that the Number of Recurring Payments is not defined.

PdctQty.description: Quantity of fuel, non-fuel, or expanded non-fuel product purchased. Three Decimal Places are implied.

PINPadInprtv.description: Contains a PIN Pad indicator which is used to indicate whether or not the PIN pad is operative.

Ctry.description: The 2-character, uppercase alpha code for the country where the customer transaction occurs

InstlmtCcy.description: Currency code associated with the instalment amount.  ISO 4217 "Codes for the representation of currencies and funds".

CrdhldrActvtd.description: Contains an unattended  cardholder activated environment indicator which indicates whether the automated device was operated solely by the cardholder or not (e.g., vending machine, automated fuel dispenser, ATM, kiosk, etc.)

tmsg.description: Message providing more details about the error

RskAssmntRsltRes.description: Result of risk assessment type (UnreliableICVV/UnreliableCVV). Or VTA ECommerce Scoring. Or VAI Visa Account Attack Intelligence Score

LocalDateTime.description: Local date and time the transaction takes place at the card acceptor location. Format is ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

MrchntVolInd.description: Merchant Volume Indicator. The only allowed value for this tag is '01'.  The request value will override what is in the profile.

ICCFllbckInd.description: Contains a chip transaction fallback indicator.

XpryDt.description: Expiration date of the account number or token in YYMM format.

PreAuthstnTmLmt.description: Preauth Time Limit in minutes.This field contains the time an issuer agrees to hold funds for an acquirer requesting an 0100 preauthorization. This field applies to preauthorizations and completions only.

PINLngthCpblties.description: Maximum number of PIN characters that can be accepted by the point-of-service device

GracePrd.description: Grace Period. Contains number of months from 00-99 that the payment is not required.

Tp.description: Other Value

Rslt.description: Account name request result. PERF: performed, NOPF: not performef, NOSP: not supported. Or OTHP for other values

OthrTp.description: Transaction ID Service Instruction. StoreTxId  Store transaction ID ,RetrieveTxId  Retrieve transaction ID ,StoreRetrieveTxId  Save/Retrieve

OthrRslt.description: Tran ID Service Result. Contains one of the following values when the acquirer requests the storage or retrieval of the original transaction details in the request message: 01 (Transaction ID stored successfully), 02 (Transaction ID not stored), 03 (Transaction ID retrieved successfully), 04 (Transaction ID not found/retrieved)

LclMrchntCtgyCd.description: Contains the domestic MCC when it differs from the international MCC

PerTxAmtTp.description: Payment Amount Indicator Per Transaction. 1(Fixed amount Recurring Payment), 2(Recurring Payment with maximum amount)

CtrySubDvsnMjr.description: The 2-character, card acceptor state or province code. For U.S. card acceptors: a 2-digit numeric state code defined by ANSI X3.38-1972 (revised 1977).For Canadian card acceptors: a 2-digit numeric province code.

NttyId.description: Entity ID used for station pairing during testing. This tag should only be included in the request message when testing in Visa's VCMS environment.

EComrcInd.description: Contains a Point-of-Service indicator which is used to indicate whether a transaction originated at the point of service or its a E-commerce request.

origId.description: Original resource identifier from related transaction for reauthorization, recurring or installment payments.

Tp.description: Type of tax included in this purchase. LOCL(Local Tax), NATI(National Tax), VATA(VAT Tax rate), OTHR(Other Tax)

Amt.description: Tax Amount. Two decimal places are implied. Only applicable to Tp values LOCI, NATI, and OTHR

Rate.description: Tax Rate. Two decimal places are implied. Only applicable to Tp values VATA and OTHR

InclInTtlInd.description: Indicator for whether the tax Tp is included in the total amount. Only applicable to the Tp values LOCL and NATI

PurchsIdr.description: Identifies the purchase to the issuer and cardholder such as order number for card not present transactions

Tp.description: Type of verification requested. Valid values: NVSC  NonVisibleCSC; CVV/iCCV results, CRYP  CryptogramVerification; Card authentication results code, THDS  3D Secure, ADDB  Billing address verification, PCDV  Postal code, CSCV  CSC verification, OTHP - Authentication Data Quality Indicator.

Drtn.description: For Rental it contains duration of rental in days.

RoomRt.description: Contains the daily rate being charged for the room. No decimal points should be used. Two decimal places are implied.

TtlTax.description: Contains the tax portion of the amount that is being billed for the room. No decimal points should be used. Two decimal places are implied.

RoomNite.description: Contains the total number of nights being billed.

NoShowInd.description: For Lodging Rental No Show Indicator indicates that the cardholder failed to show up and was therefore charged a no-show fee. The room was not actually rented.

TtlRoomTax.description: Contains the room tax that is being billed. No decimal points should be used. Two decimal places are implied.

XchgRate.description: the rate used by VisaNet to convert the transaction amount to the cardholder billing amount

Cpblty.description: Contains a PIN entry capability indicator used to indicate whether or not this terminal can accept online PINs. UNSP  Unknown. NPIN  Indicates terminal can accept and forward online PINs. NOOP  Indicates terminal cannot accept and forward online PINs.

Tp.description: Ev Specific type. TtlTm(Total Time), TtlChrgTm(Total Changing Time), StrtTm(Start Time), EndTm(End Time), PwrCpcty(Charging Power Output Capacity), ChrgRsnCode(Charging Reason Code), EstmAdd(Estimated Km/Miles Added), CrbnFtprnt(Carbon Footprint), EstmAvlb(Estimated vehicle km/miles available), MaxPwrDspnsd(Maximum Power Dispensed), ConnTp(Connector Type)

Val.description: Value for the Ev Specific type given in Tp

EvChargInd.description: Electric Vehicle Charging Indicator. This indicator should be included in every instance of LineItm that has EV fields

PurchsIdrTp.description: Purchase identifier type. Purchase identifier type is required in the U.S. Valid values: ORNU (Order number), REAG (Rental agreement),FONU (Folio number)

rPAN.description: Replacement PAN if new PAN requested / Replacement account number provided by Real Time VAU

TxtVal.description: Value for ADDB, PCDV, CSCV, DRIV, PASN, NTID, TXIN Validation

CardSeqNb.description: A number assigned to a card when two or more individual cards are associated with the same primary account number

Tp.description: Unit Cost type. UNPC(Unit Cost), GRFP(Gross Fuel Price), NTFP(Net Fuel Price), GNFP(Gross Non-Fuel Price), NFFP(Net Non-Fuel Price)

Val.description: Value for the type of Unit Cost given in Tp. Three Decimal places are implied except for NFFP where two decimal places are implied

Prgrmm.description: Specifies the name of the special incentive program. Only Valid Value is CPS (Custom Payment Service)

Tp.description: ECI - Level of security used in an electronic commerce transaction. If none provided for eCom transactions, the default value of 7 is used in the request. XID - contains a unique Visa Secure Electronic Commerce (VSEC) number-the transaction ID or XID-generated by the merchant server to identify the transaction

Val.description: For ECI - Level of security used in an electronic commerce transaction. If none provided for eCom transactions, the default value of 7 is used in the request (1 Characters - 5/6/7/8). For XID - contains a unique Visa Secure Electronic Commerce (VSEC) number-the transaction ID or XID-generated by the merchant server to identify the transaction (40 Character Binary)

Tp.description: CC: Condition Code

Val.description: Value for Tp

UnitOfMeasr.description: Unit of Measure. LITR(Liter), USGA(U.S. gallon), GBGA(Imperial gallon), KILO(Kilo), PUND(Pound), CHMT(Charging minutes), KWHO(Kilowatt per hour)

MaxAmt.description: Maximum amount agreed to by the cardholder. Amount will be specified in F49 currency(Currency Code, Transaction)

CardDataNtryMd.description: Contains a card data entry method value which is used to indicate card reading capabilities of the terminal performing the transaction. Valid values: KEEN  Key entered, MGST  Magnetic stripe read and exact content of Track 1 or Track 2 included (CVV check may or may not be possible), OPTC  Optical code (e.g., barcode, QR code), ICCY  Contact integrated circuit card read using VSDC chip data rules; Online CAM authentication method; iCVV checking may or may not be possible, ICPY  Contactless device-read-originated using qVSDC chip data rules; Online CAM authentication method; iCVV checking possible, MSIP - Contactless device-read-originated using magnetic stripe data rules; dCVV checking is possible; Online CAM checking possible for MSD CVN 17 only. CDFL - Credential on file

ApldSvc.description: Contains the indicate that the merchant has used a DCAP eligible method for authentication or data sharing and that they have provided all the mandatory DCAP data elements. 1 = VDCAP

Tp.description: National Net Settlement Service data elements. Valid values: NATIRF = National Reimbursement Fee, NATMATYP = National Net Miscellaneous Amount Type, NATIRFBASE = National Net IRF Amount, NATMISCAMT = National Net Miscellaneous Amount, NATVATBASE = Amount Base of Value Add Tax to Return, NATCTAX = Consumption Tax Amount, NATVATAMT = Value Add Tax Amount, NATCTIND = Cost Transaction Indicator, NATCBRC = National Chargeback Reason Code, NATTOKENDT = National Net Domestic Token Data

Val.description: National Net Settlement Service data values. For Tp = NATIRF, Val = reimbursement fee. Must be expressed in the currency present in Body.Tx.TxAmts.TxAmt.Ccy. For Tp = NATMATYP, Val = A (Airport charge), C (Cashback), or T (Tip). For Tp = NATIRFBASE, Val = an amount greater than 0. For Tp = NATMISCAMT, Val = Amount of tip, cashback, or airport tax. For Tp = NATVATBASE, Val = base value of IVA (sales tax). For Tp = NATCTAX, Val = consumption tax amount. For Tp = NATVATAMT, Val = national government tax for added value. For Tp = NATCTIND, Val = 1 (Cost Inquiry Transaction). For Tp = NATCBRC, Val = 2-digit Visa chargeback reason code. For TP = NATTOKENDT, Val = optional supplementary private information for Colombia National Net Settlement Service

Drtn.description: For Rental it contains duration of rental in days

VhclClss.description: Contains a code indicating the type of vehicle.

DailyRate.description: Contains the daily rate being charged for the vehicle

InsrncAmt.description: Contains insurance being charged for the vehicle.

WeeklyRate.description: Contains the weekly rate being charged for the vehicle.

AcctTp.description: Account Type from. Response values: SAVE - 10 Savings account, CHCK - 20 Checking account, CRDC - 30 Credit Card account, UNIV - 40 Universal, DRFD - 35 Deferred Debit, CHRG - 36 Charge, PRPD - 60 Prepaid, CEBT - 96 cash benefits account, FEBT - 98 Food stamps account.

Cd.description: A code that represents the travel agency used during booking, if applicable.

Nm.description: The name of the travel agency used during booking, if applicable.

Id.description: Visa assigned identifier for the client.

PurchsTp.description: Type of Purchase FUEL(Fuel purchase), NONF(Non-Fuel purchase), FANF(Fuel and Non-Fuel purchase)

Tp.description: Type of SCA (strong customer authentication) performed. Possible Values - TMBE-Trusted Merchant Beneficiary Exemption, LOWA-Low Value Exemption, TRAE-Transaction Risk Analysis Exemption, SCPE-Secure Corporate Payment Exemption.

Val.description: Value associated with type of Strong Customer Authentication Type. Valid values in request: CLAI = Claimed

RouteNb.description: Contains the number of the airline flight to be taken on the each leg of the trip.

AddtlData.description: Miscellaneous information. This tag will either represent the IATA arrival airport code, or a three-character miscellaneous charge. Miscellaneous charges can be found in Table 85 of the SMS Full Service POS Online Messages Technical Specifications document.

FareBsisCd.description: Contains a code that indicates the fare basis for the each leg of the trip

StopOverInd.description: Stop over indicator. space or O - Stop-over allowed, X No stop-over allowed

TxDesc.description: Information about the merchandise in the transaction.

SchmeId.description: Contains the card scheme selected for the transaction 01(Visa), 02(Others)

Tp.description: PlanRegSysId - Contains the plan registration system identifier value to identify the transaction as a Visa Installment Solutions transaction. This identifier is a ten-character alphanumeric unique value. Or HostBsdPrchRstrctn - Allows issuer to apply restrictions to the purchase. Response value must be included in the completion advice.

Val.description: Plan Registration System Identifier or Value for Host-Based Purchase Restrictions. This response value must be included in the complete advice request for Host-Based Purchase Restrictions

GrdTtlAmt.description: Total amount of the instalment including charges, insurance, and taxes in addition to the funded amount. The total amount cannot exceed USD$500,000.00

ICCRltdData.description: Contains integrated circuit card (ICC)-related data that is transmitted from the ICC to the card issuer and from the card issuer to the ICC. This field supports both usage 1 (VSDC chip data) and usage 2 (chip card data).

VhclClss.description: Contains a code indicating the type of vehicle.

DailyRate.description: Contains the daily rate being charged for the vehicle

InsrncAmt.description: Contains insurance being charged for the vehicle.

WeeklyRate.description: Contains the weekly rate being charged for the vehicle.

ValInd.description: Validation Indictor. Offline validation between Acquirer and Issuer during registration: false(not validated), true(validated)

Tp.description: This field containt code to identifies the basic POS electronic terminal type. 9 = MPOS (Use to identify that an mPOS device is used to originate a transaction on an open network)

Id.description: This field contains a code that identifies a terminal at the card acceptor location, by itself or in conjunction with Card Acceptor Identification Code, when the value is not unique to a terminal.  An identification code of fewer than 8 positions must be left-justified and the remainder of the field space-filled

aId.description: This field contains an acquirer-assigned code identifying the card acceptor for the transaction. The code can represent a merchant, a merchant location, or a merchant location terminal. If the ID code is less than 15 positions, it must be left-justified and space-filled.

Tp.description: Contains the Additional data IDs like GtyMrchntData- Gateway Merchant Data descriptor, BusRegID- Acceptor Business Registration ID.

Val.description: Contains the Additional data value for Ids in the TP like GtyMrchntData- Gateway Merchant Data Bank ABA number,  BusRegID- Acceptor Business Registration ID number.

AddtlId.description: Unique identifier value assigned by Visa for each merchant included in the identification program

RskAssmntRslt.description: Result of risk assessment type (UnreliableICVV/UnreliableCVV). Or VTA ECommerce Scoring

Id.description: Contains a code that specifies the network to be used for transmission of the message and determines the program rules that apply to the transaction. All Network ID Codes can be found in 63.1 of the SMS Full Service POS Online Technical Specifications.

RefNb.description: Customer Reference Number. The value may be a reference number, code, or generic number. Fuel transactions are identified by an MCC value of 5541 or 5542. In online transactions destined to an issuer, V.I.P. inserts Tag 1A and populates it with the customer code or reference identifier supplied by the acquirer in field 48, usage 36. Hence, fields 104 and 48 are present.

LineItmres.description: A separate line item should be added to the array for each fuel, non-fuel, and expanded non-fuel product included in the transaction. The array can accept up to 1 fuel type, 8 non-fuel types, and 4 expanded non-fuel types, for a maximum of 13 line items within the array.

Tp.description: Mastercard, Amex, Discover/Diners Gateway data. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

Val.description: Mastercard, Amex, Discover/Diners Gateway data values. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

GatewayAddtnlData.description: Addtnldata for GatewayData. Contains Tp, Val pairs of data for non-Visa branded cards. Please reference the VPP release notes for a list of all Tp and Val pairs

Tp.description: Sales Org Id

Val.description: Sales Org Id

Tp.description: Type of Additional Card Data. Possible Values - AcctFndgSrc -Account Funding Source.

Val.description: Value associated with type of Account Funding Source. Possible Values - CRDT - Credit, DBIT - Debit, PRPD - Prepaid.

Dt.description: Date the customer checked into the hotel, in the format YYMMDD. For an advance lodging deposits and no shows, the lodging check-in date is the anticipated check-in date.

Tp.description: Type of verification requested. Valid values: Card authentication results code, THDS  3D Secure, ADDB  Billing address verification, PCDV  Postal code, CSCV  CSC verification

ResSys.description: Contains a code that indicates the computerized reservation system used to make the reservation and purchase the ticket.

CdtRsnCd.description: Contains a code that indicates the reason for a credit to the cardholder.

TxSubTp.description: Business Application Identifier - CB Consumer Bill Payment

RegnRefNb.description: Registration Reference Number. Contains unique reference number for recurring payment transactions. This number is generated before the recurring payment registration. It is required at the time of registration transaction and in every subsequent transaction.

Tp.description: Free form description data for the transaction or Sharing Group Code

Val.description: Free form description data for the transaction or Sharing Group Code. Valid values for Sharing Group Code: C(CU24), E(Accel), F(NYCE), G(Interlink), H(Pulse), K(EBTPOS), L(Pulse), M(Star), N(Star), P(NETS), Q(Star), S(Pulse), U(AFFN), V(Visa), W(Star), Y(NYCE), Z(Star), 3(AlaskaOption), 7(Shazam), 8(Maestro)

Tp.description: Provides detailed information about lodging accommodations and related expenses for the cardholder. Acquirers can submit multiple occurrences of this component for each lodging transaction to provide details of one or more folios. Valid Values are: 2(Restaurant or Room Service)=[REST] Restaurant, 3(Gift Shop)=[GIFT] Gift Shop, 4(Mini-Bar)=[MINI] Mini Bar, 5(Telephone)=[PHON] Phone, 6(Other) [OTHR] Other, 7(Laundry)=[LAUN] Laundry

Val.description: Contains amount, No decimal points should be used. Two decimal places are implied.

OthrTp.description: Contains prepaid expenses, food or beverage, folio cash advances being billed.

Tp.description: Extra charges for auto rentals. FUEL - Gasoline (1), EXDI - Extra Mileage (2), LATE - Late Return (3), ONEW - Drop Off Charge (4), FINE - Parking or Moving Violation (5)

TtlDrtn.description: Contains the total number of days that the vehicle was rented

DpofChrg.description: Contains charges for one-way drop-off of the vehicle.

FuelChrg.description: Contains fuel being charged for the vehicle.

ChckOutDt.description: Check Out Date (CCYYMMDD) contains the date the vehicle was picked-up by the customer. In the case of a no-show transaction or a prepaid transaction, this contains the scheduled pickup date.

NoShowInd.description: For Vehicle Rental No Show Indicator indicates that the cardholder failed to pick up the vehicle and was therefore charged a no-show fee. The vehicle was not actually rented

FleetPdctCd.description: Fuel or non-fuel product code. Fuel type codes are listed in Base II Clearing Data Codes document.

CardRdngCpblty.description: Contains a terminal entry capability indicator. Valid values: KEEN  Key entered (terminal is not used), MGST - Magnetic stripe read capability, OPTC  QR code, OCRR - OCR read capability, ICCY - Contact chip, magnetic-stripe, or proximity-capable terminal, indicating that the terminal can read the chip and the magnetic stripe on the card. If contact chip is supported, an ICCY should be used regardless of whether Visa Contactless is also supported, ICPY - contactless specification but cannot read a contact chip on a card. For Visa Contactless, an ICPY should be used only if Visa Contactless is supported and contact chip is not.

Algo.description: Contains an encryption algorithm used to encipher encrypted data elements in dataset or keys in associated key management data element

Ctrl.description: Key Management  scheme for encryption data in dataset.

DrvdInf.description: Contains 19-bit device ID and 21-bit transaction counter. Required for PIN data with DUKPT encryption.

KeySetIdr.description: Specifies identifier for encryption key. Required for PIN data with DUKPT encryption.

PINBlckFrmt.description: Carries code defining encrypted PIN data format and describing PIN block format.

NcrptdPINBlck.description: Encrypted Pin Data. Required for PIN data with AWK, IWK, and DUKPT encryption.

tAcceptorId.description: Payment Facilitator Identifier Identifies the marketplace or payment facilitator

Amt.description: Transaction amount with explicit decimal point to represent minor unit.

GatewayBrand.description: Contains a Brand for GatewayData processing. Valid values: Mastercard - MSC, American Express - AMX, Discover - DSC

Tp.description: Dynamic Currency Conversion Indicator or Other value

OthrTp.description: Transaction ID Service Instruction. StoreTxId  Store transaction ID ,RetrieveTxId  Retrieve transaction ID ,StoreRetrieveTxId  Save/Retrieve

reqstId.description: Unique request ID generated by the server for every reply, even for duplicate transactions. The value can be used to contact Visa about a specific request.

Tp.description: This field containt code to identifies the basic POS electronic terminal type. MPOS (Use to identify that an mPOS device is used to originate a transaction on an open network)

HexBinryVal.description: the information encoded on Track 2 of the magnetic stripe, including field separators but excluding beginning and ending sentinels and LRC characters

Trck1.description: the information encoded on Track 1 of the magnetic stripe, including field separators but excluding beginning and ending sentinels and LRC characters

Prgrmm.description: Specifies the name of the special incentive program. Only Valid Value is CPS (Custom Payment Service)

ApldSvc.description: Contains the indicate that the merchant has used a DCAP eligible method for authentication or data sharing and that they have provided all the mandatory DCAP data elements. 1 = VDCAP

PltfrmCd.description: Applied Product Platform Code indicates the card product platform. Possible Values - Business - BUSS, Consumer - CSMR, Commercial - COMM, Government - GOVN, Payouts - PYOT.

MplyeeId.description: Fleet Employee Number. Contains the Visa Fleet cardholder employee number.

EFleetPdctCd.description: Expanded non-fuel type. Contains the purchased expanded non-fuel product code

Tp.description: Additional transaction detail type or Healthcare auto-substantiation details. Valid Values:SRCH  Surcharge amount,CSHB  Purchase cashback amount, 4S - Total Amount Healthcare, 4V - Amount Vision/Optical, 4U - Amount Prescription/RX, 4W - Amount Clinic/Other Qualified Medical, 4X - Amount Dental, 3S - Amount co-payment, 4P - Additional Transaction Fee 1, 4Q - Additional Transaction Fee 2

Amt.description: Additional transaction detail type amount for either surcharge or cashback

CdtDbt.description: This field is applicable and used to indicate if the surcharge is a debit or credit against the cardholder account. CRDT  credit , DBIT  debit(default value)

Tp.description: This field containt code to identifies the basic POS electronic terminal type. MPOS (Use to identify that an mPOS device is used to originate a transaction on an open network)

Id.description: This field contains a code that identifies a terminal at the card acceptor location, by itself or in conjunction with Card Acceptor Identification Code, when the value is not unique to a terminal.  An identification code of fewer than 8 positions must be left-justified and the remainder of the field space-filled

MOTOInd.description: Mail/Phone (MOTO) Boolean indicator distinguishing the type of mail or telephone order

CardPrtflIdr.description: Contains a program identification number used with a product ID attribute

CaptureDt.description: Capture Date in the format MMDD

Tp.description: Type of SCA (strong customer authentication) performed. Possible Values - TMBE-Trusted Merchant Beneficiary Exemption, LOWA-Low Value Exemption, TRAE-Transaction Risk Analysis Exemption, SCPE-Secure Corporate Payment Exemption.

Val.description: Value associated with type of Strong Customer Authentication Type. Valid values in response: HONO = Honored, NHON = Not Honored

RsnNotHnrd.description: This tag (up to 20) is used to input text to detail a reason the exemption was not honored. This will be present in the Response. Multiple response tags can be present for a single exemption request

AltrnMsgRsn.description: States why the action was taken. Possible values include: 2501 - Transaction voided by customer, 2502 - Request timed out, 2503 - No confirmation from point of service, 2504 - Partial void (only valid for Authorization voids).

Tp.description: Tp value for verification. Possible value is authenticationValue (Card Authentication Verification Value) if Tp=THDS. DAF - Digital Authentication Framework, AuthDataQualInd if Tp=OTHP

AgtFuelPrmptCd2.description: Fleet Additional Prompted Data 2. Contains information the cardholder is prompted to provide at the POS for issuer and fleet employer purposes.

DlgtdAuthrty.description: Details regarding Delegated Authority - CLAI = Claimed

AgtFuelPrmptCd1.description: Fleet Additional Prompted Data 1. Contains information the cardholder is prompted to provide at the POS for issuer and fleet employer purposes.

DlgtdAuthrty.description: Details regarding Delegated Authority - HONO = Honored, NHON = Not Honored

tFrgnRtlrInd.description: Identifies a foreign retailer under a marketplace. DEfault value is false

VATInstlmtIntrst.description: VAT for Installment Payment Interest. Vat calculated by acquirer for interest applicable to the transaction.

Ccy.description: Numeric currency code conforming to ISO 4217.

Tp.description: Data that is returned unaltered in the response message.

Val.description: Data that is returned unaltered in the response message.

tAmtQlfr.description: Qualifier or type of amount. Possible value is ESTM (Estimated amount) (the final amount could be more or less than the estimated amount

Id.description: Exchange Rate Identification. Identification of the specific rate, table, or file that contains the rate information.

Prvdr.description: Identifies the source of exchange rate information. Valid value is 'Visa Inc., Exchange Rate'

Elgbl.description: Indicates if a transaction is eligible for a rate lock. Possible values Y-true, N-false
